# auto-generated by grc.converter

id: sandia_utils_csv_reader
label: CSV Reader
category: '[Sandia]/Sandia Utilities'

parameters:
-   id: file
    label: File
    dtype: file_open
-   id: has_header
    label: Header?
    dtype: enum
    default: 'True'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    option_labels: ['Yes', 'No']
-   id: data_type
    label: Data Type
    dtype: enum
    default: '''uint8'''
    options: ['''uint8''', '''int8''', '''uint16''', '''int16''', '''uint32''', '''int32''',
        '''float''', '''complex float''', '''double''', '''complex double''']
    option_labels: [Unsigned 8-bit Integer, Signed 8-bit Integer, Unsigned 16-bit
            Integer, Signed 8-bit Integer, Unsigned 32-bit Integer, Signed 32-bit
            Integer, Single Precision (Float), Complex Single Precision (Complex Float),
        Double Precision (Double), Complex Double Precision (Complex Double)]
-   id: period
    label: Message Period (ms)
    dtype: int
    default: '1000'
-   id: start_delay
    label: Start Delay (ms)
    dtype: int
    default: '0'
-   id: repeat
    label: Repeat?
    dtype: bool
    default: 'False'
    options: ['True', 'False']
    hide: part

outputs:
-   domain: message
    id: out

templates:
    imports: import sandia_utils
    make: "sandia_utils.csv_reader(${file}, ${has_header}, ${data_type},\n
    ${period},${start_delay},${repeat})"
    callbacks:
    - set_fname(${file})
    - set_period(${period})
    - set_repeat(${repeat})
    - set_start_delay(${start_delay})
